metadata.title: CVE-2023-39593 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Insecure permissions in the sys_exec function of Oracle MYSQL MariaDB v10.5allows authenticated attackers to execute arbitrary commands with elevatedprivileges.

criterions.comment: mysql-8.0 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mariadb-10.6 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
